titles.title: POST FAST Act of 2023
POST FAST Act of 2023
Publish Overdose and Suicide Tracking For American Safety Today Act of 2023
To require the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to accelerate the collection and publication of data on suicide and drug overdoses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Publish Overdose and Suicide Tracking For American Safety Today Act of 2023 or the POST FAST Act of 2023
This bill requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to publish data about suicides and drug overdoses in the United States for a given month within 60 days of the end of that month.
